examples.example: 妈妈细心地提醒我按时服用药片，让我感受到了她的关爱。

translate.english: Mother carefully reminds me to take the pills on time, which makes me feel her love.

examples.example: 我每天都会按时服用药片，希望自己能早日恢复健康。

translate.english: I take the pills on time every day and hope I can recover my health soon.

examples.example: 我把药片放在手心里，感受到了健康的希望。

translate.english: I put the tablet in the palm of my hand and felt the hope of health.
